markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs=""
>
[Twilight Lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1451)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 76</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant hooded lantern is made from onyx-black metal. In dim light, flecks of white metal speckled within the lantern's housing resemble stars in a night sky. The lantern uses oil as a standard hooded lantern, except that any light the lantern emits is converted into magical light similar to moonlight. This magical moonlight is always dim light.

<document level="2" id="action-1094" />

<document level="2" id="action-1095" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<row gap="medium">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Limited"
>
Twilight Lantern (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 850 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The counteract modifier is +17, and the maximum radius is equal to triple the light's standard radius.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Limited"
>
Twilight Lantern (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 3,700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

As _moderate twilight lantern_, but the counteract modifier is +21.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Limited"
>
Twilight Lantern (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 18,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The counteract modifier is +28, and the maximum radius is equal to quadruple the light's standard radius.
